pages.text: $(l)$(item)Elemental Combination$() - is a powerful process, when $(o)several items are disassembled into the simplest elements and fill an object$()(called an $(thing)elemental$()). But it's not that simple!$(br)To combine something properly it needs $(l)'blueprint'$()!

Basically, you just need to follow the proportions and the device itself will determine what to do next, but when the item is very complex, you may need an 'instruction'.$(br2)And that how it basically works!$(br)$(o)Almost all hardness is hidden behind combinator's body.$()
